```
    #!/bin/bash -ex
    # Creates a VM intended for Fedora 23 Server
     qm create 103 \
         -balloon 512 \
         -bootdisk virtio0 \
         -cores 2 \
         -ide2 local:iso/Fedora-Server-netinst-x86_64-23.iso,media=cdrom \
         -memory 1024 \
         -name fedora-server-ch4 \
         -net0 virtio,bridge=vmbr0 \
         -numa 0 \
         -ostype l26 \
         -sockets 1 \
         -virtio0 local:101/vm-101-disk-1.qcow2,size=32G \
         -vga qxl
```
